Server
Class EditorServer

java.lang.Object
  Server.EditorServer

public class EditorServer
extends java.lang.Object

Description of EditorServer: This class creates a EditorServer that contains a ServerSocket called "CollaborativeSocket", this is the server that sends all the collabrative things that users can do together. It contains a collaborativePort, String name of Host, String name of clientName, and an arraylist of texts.

Version:
Final Version: May 6th, 2015
Author:
HCS Group: Siddharth Sharma, Luis Guerrero, Maverick Tudisco, Chintan Patel
